summary: A former Texas sheriff, living in Mexico, goes to Arizona to investigate the murky circumstances under which his brother, a peaceful newspaperman, was killed.
cast: Audie Murphy|Broderick Crawford|Diana Lorys|Aldo Sambrell|Antonio Casas|Gérard Tichy|Antonio Molino Rojo|Juan Antonio Peral|Helga Genth|Emilio Rodríguez|Frank Braña|Luz Márquez|Marta May|Víctor Vilanova|Carlos Hurtado|Víctor Israel|José Manuel Pinillos|César Ojinaga|Vicente Soler|Juan Torres|Santiago Rivero|Manuel Quintana|Carlos Miguel Solá|Ángel Lombarte|A. Malla|Oscar Del Campo|Dionisio Macías
title: Texas Kid
